result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2019
result.name: BigmanSocal
result.title: No box?
result.review: Product is fine, but was dropped off on my doorstep just like that, with no box.Anyone happened to walk by, wouldve seen an xbox sitting on my doorstep, asking to get stolen.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
result.name: kaldiva
result.title: Avoid if on WiFi
result.review: I purchased this somewhere else but wanted to make others aware. If you are connecting this to wifi stay far away! It disconnects every 5 minutes.I also own the X and connected via WiFi in the same room with zero problems so it is definitely a issue with the all digital unit.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2019
result.name: Brittany Fisher
result.review: New, fully sealed, the codes weren’t expired, nothing damaged, and it’s working great. 10/10 would recommend!

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2019
result.name: K-von
result.title: Overall review
result.review: I love this Xbox one s it runs great and this is my first Xbox but one thing I don’t get is when I try to type in the Fortnite redeem code it says code is already redeemed but overall great game console.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2019
result.name: James
result.title: Everything works as it should.
result.review: I'm saving up a bit so I can rebuild my PC, it's out of commission due to some component failure. I got the xbox one s all digital to fill its place. It was cheaper for the one without the CD drive. Everything appears to be working as it should.I don't particularly like the menu, I occasionally forget how to navigate it, but like I said I'm a PC gamer.My internet connection works fine for wifi.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
result.name: Amazon Customer
result.title: Great console for perfect price!
result.review: The best option for those who want to keep everything in the cloud. Works great, although the interface is a bit messy at first if you are using Xbox for the first time, it's just a matter of time to get know each other :)Besides this, you get a 3-month game pass for $1, so your happy new year is already provided.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2019
result.name: Timo Rinne
result.title: Awesome console at a great price
result.review: Got this to play online with some friends. Works great. Slim profile and the white is really attractive. Best part is the amazing price.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
result.name: Kevin H.
result.title: Great product
result.review: Can’t beat the price! I got this as a second unit. One for living room, one for bedroom

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
result.name: R. Shelton
result.title: Crazy EXPENSIVE digital games!Don’t recommend
result.review: The idea is good and the gameplay is fine.However, I wouldn’t recommend this until the pricing gets in line.Games you can buy on Amazon brand new on disc are fairly cheap.However, none I’ve purchased came with digital codes and digital versions are typically WAY more expensive.Example, Golf Club 2019 is $19.99.Want the digital version?That’ll be $49.99.Why?I get no disc, no plastic, no shipping, yet it costs 2.5 times as much!?Crazy.Get this pricing in line Amazon/Microsoft! Otherwise buy a version that accepts discs and save yourself in the long run.I wouldn’t buy this again.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2019
result.name: Pitbullmum3
result.title: PACKAGE IT vs SHIP AS IS!!
result.review: Ok...so for the XBOX awesome...for the packaging...you may WANT TO PUT IT IN A BOX FOR CONCEALMENT PURPOSES!!!Reason 1, Neighborhood kids knocked on the door to see who was home, why you ask?? BECAUSE THERE WAS A BRAND NEW XBOX ONE SITTING IN THE OPEN AT MY DOOR!!Reason 2, Husband and three boys opened door to find a brand new XBOX one and neighborhood kids looking at the BRAND NEW XBOX ONE!!Reason 3, ITS COMMON SENSE!!!Thank you have a fabulous day!!
